tweet: We will be working together on the federal level along with state & local officials to rebuild our community. I want to again thank the first responders and media who saved countless lives through their work. pic.twitter.com/fMKyYVzMNq

Today I hosted @GOPLeader in #OH10 to be briefed by local officials & tour the extensive damage in our community from these tornadoes. I want to thank Kevin for coming to Ohio to see the devastation firsthand. pic.twitter.com/nlDvMT7rQV

This afternoon I welcomed @GovMikeDeWine in @CityOfTrotwood with @mayormmcdonald to survey the severe storm damage in #OH10. I look forward to working with our other federal, state, and local officials to rebuild our community. pic.twitter.com/fZ2PMP3lxr

Today we honor the millions of brave Americans who fought and gave their lives to keep our country safe and free. Your ultimate sacrifice is not forgotten. #MemorialDay

Incredibly proud of our community for standing up to hate without violence. Thank you to @DaytonPolice and all law enforcement who helped keep everyone safe. Looking forward to washing Courthouse Square clean of hate tomorrow @ 2pm.

Last week I re-introduced the Fostering Stable Housing Opportunities Act to help break the issue of federally created homelessness, in which youth are currently aging out of foster care and into homelessness. Learn more via @COXMG & @whiotv's @DoreyScheimer: pic.twitter.com/UX63bTWkwN

Sad tonight about the news of the passing of I.M. Pei. The building he designed in downtown Dayton is a signature staple in our skyline. May his memory live on through his iconic achievements in architecture.
